name: ThreeTwoPix: Fang Runner
storyline:
The year was 2021. A new game called Three Two Pix took over New Fang City and every Fangster in town got addicted to it.

Banks were no longer robbed, Piggies wandered free and the fang sharpener business went bankrupt... Streets were empty... Every single Fangster was sitting inside playing.

Until one day the whole city was sucked into the game and every Fangster became a 32px version of itself.
summary:
Run your way through New Fang City, collecting diamonds, avoiding paperhands and jumping over awful flippers.

An endless arcade runner, can you beat the community highscore?
